name: Riot (Rui Moreira)
description:
RIOT

A twin stick shooter about a police robot who’s in charge of destroying all its enemies,  using their atacks against themselves.

To do this the character has a shield, whose color he can change. The enemies shoot projectiles in 3 colors (RGB), and the robot is only able to reflect them if it's shield matches the color of the projectile. He also has a dash feature and a pick up which lets him choose the color of the projectiles.

This Game was made in 24h, for the 2019 MAD Game Jam, developed by a team of three, me Rui Moreira (3D Assets and Character Artist), Jorge Antão (Programmer and UX Developer) and Miguel Souto (Environment Artist).

The Game was awarded 3º Place and we could not be more happy with it. One of the critics was that the controllers were a litle to dificult.
